page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: COMMUTERS. Most people who work,and who live in our block have to commute to work.Only a small percentage of the population actually work in the village. PLACES OF WORK. The Atomic Energy Research Establishment at Harwell employs quite a lot of people from the village.Some work at Metal Box, Autotype, BNF or other places in Wantage. Some people travel up to London every day, others work in Abingdon or Oxford. LOCAL EMPLOYMENT. There are very few industries in East and West Hanney so those people employed locally probably work on the farms.
